subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oliver Perez gave up a run in six and a third innings, but Felipe Lopez’s grand slam off Raul Valdes in the seventh rallied the Cardinals to a 4-3 victory.
snippet: Oliver Perez gave up a run in six and a third innings, but Felipe Lopez’s grand slam off Raul Valdes in the seventh rallied the Cardinals to a 4-3 victory.
